summary: Mixin offering utilities to load, fuse, unfuse, and manage LoRA (Low‑Rank Adaptation) weights for the UNet and CLIP text encoder components of a Stable Diffusion XL model.
business_intent: Facilitate quick integration, fine‑tuning, and weight management of LoRA adapters in Stable Diffusion XL pipelines, allowing users to modify model behavior without retraining the full model.
